message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this great product for $14,000.  I think it will be very beneficial for you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm really interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit higher than I was hoping to spend.  Would you be willing to do $12,000?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $14,000 represents a fair price for its value, I could be persuaded to go as low as $13,000. This is my final offer.
